Class CandidateLocalServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liferay.portal.service.BaseLocalServiceImpl
      • at.meduni.liferay.portlet.rdconnect.service.base.CandidateLocalServiceBaseImpl
        • at.meduni.liferay.portlet.rdconnect.service.impl.CandidateLocalServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    at.meduni.liferay.portlet.rdconnect.service.CandidateLocalService, com.liferay.portal.kernel.bean.IdentifiableBean, com.liferay.portal.service.BaseLocalService, com.liferay.portal.service.InvokableLocalService, com.liferay.portal.service.PersistedModelLocalService

    public class CandidateLocalServiceImpl
extends CandidateLocalServiceBaseImpl
    The implementation of the candidate local service.

    All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the CandidateLocalService interface.

    This is a local service. Methods of this service will not have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can only be accessed from within the same VM.

    Author:
    Robert Reihs
    See Also:
    CandidateLocalServiceBaseImpl, CandidateLocalServiceUtil
